amendment.description: Amendment sought to ensure that any rule intended to protect public health and welfare is exempted from the requirements of this act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Castor (FL) amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 231 (Roll no. 37).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Castor (FL) amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 231 (Roll no. 37).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Castor (FL).
